'''Alcar mi Tarmenel na Erun''' is [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s translation of the ''[[Wikipedia:Gloria in excelsis Deo|Gloria in excelsis Deo]]'' into [[Quenya]]. The manuscript containing several revisions and associated fragments was published in {{VT|44}}, edited by [[Arden R. Smith]].

==Prayer==
The final editorial version of the prayer:
:''Alcar mi tarmenel na Erun ar mi cemen raine i hínin''.
:"Glory [be] to God in the Highest, and peace to His people on earth".
